definitions.text: an informal term for a youth or man
examples: the guy's only doing it for some doll

definitions.text: an effigy of Guy Fawkes that is burned on a bonfire on Guy Fawkes Day
a cable, wire, or rope that is used to brace something (especially a tent)

examples: The satirists ridiculed the plans for a new opera house
The students poked fun at the inexperienced teacher
His former students roasted the professor at his 60th birthday

definitions.text: steady or support with a guy wire or cable
examples: The Italians guyed the Tower of Pisa to prevent it from collapsing
